short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Checkmark Sums on the Desmos Teacher Dashboard. (unofficial)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the number of checkmarks a student has achieved on the Desmos Classroom Teacher Dashboard automatically, displays the total on the screen for the teacher to see.

(This extension is not affiliated with Amplify or Desmos Classroom in any official capacity)
